description:
Furuya`s sister, Hotaru, gets into his phone. She tries to troll Minagawa, but Minagawa pulls out her mind games once again. Kamine wants Goda to say he loves her, but he doesn`t know how. Kanda has been avoiding Takase ever since their awkward text confession. Dating master senpai to the rescue! Takano is so dense, even her own body is trying to give her hints.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Trap / Tell Me / Advice / It`s All the Fever`s Fault
Wana / Kikasete yo / Advice / Zenbu Netsu no Sei
罠 / 聞かせてよ / アドバイス / 全部熱のせい
함정 / 들려줘 / 어드바이스 / 전부 열 때문
